食積み: (くいつみ) - New Year food for entertaining a guest served in multilayered lacquered boxes; (Edo name)  Kansai New Year decoration (made from food)
食管法: (しょっかんほう) - law governing food quality
食糞: (しょくふん) - coprophagia; coprophagy; scatophagy; eating feces (faeces)
食糧: (shokuryou) - food (especialmente alimentos básicos como arroz ou trigo), provisions, rations, food supply
食糧不足: (しょくりょうぶそく) - food shortage
食糧事情: (しょくりょうじじょう) - food situation
食糧危機: (しょくりょうきき) - food crisis; food-supply crisis
食糧庁: (しょくりょうちょう) - food agency
食糧援助: (しょくりょうえんじょ) - food assistance
食糧管理制度: (しょくりょうかんりせいど) - food control system
食糧管理法: (しょくりょうかんりほう) - Staple Food Control Act
食糧配給: (しょくりょうはいきゅう) - food distribution
食紅: (しょくべに) - red food coloring; red food colouring
食縛る: (くいしばる) - to set one's teeth; to clench one's teeth; to grit one's teeth
食缶: (しょっかん) - food container (esp. for transport)
食習慣: (しょくしゅうかん) - eating habits
食肉加工品: (しょくにくかこうひん) - processed meat product
食肉植物: (しょくにくしょくぶつ) - carnivorous plants
食肉類: (しょくにくるい) - carnivores (i.e. animals of the order Carnivora)
食育: (しょくいく) - dietary education; nutrition education; food education
食膳: (しょくぜん) - dining table; a dish (type of food)
食草: (しょくそう) - edible grass (for insects); larval food plant
食菌: (しょくきん) - (ant: 毒菌) edible mushroom
食虫性: (しょくちゅうせい) - insectivorous; entomophagous
食虫植物: (しょくちゅうしょくぶつ) - insectivorous plants; carnivorous plants
食虫虻: (ムシヒキアブ) - robber fly (any fly of family Asilidae)
食蟻獣: (アリクイ) - (食蟻獣 is gikun) anteater
食言: (しょくげん) - eat one's words; break one's promises
食費を取る: (しょくひをとる) - to charge for one's meal
食込む: (くいこむ) - to bite into (e.g. rope into skin)/to cut into/to dig into (e.g. of fingernails); to eat into/to encroach/to make inroads/to penetrate (e.g. a market)/to break into (e.g. first place)/to erode/to cut into (e.g. time, savings); to be wedged (i.e. underwear pulled from the back, driving it between the buttocks)
食違い: (くいちがい) - discrepancy; different or conflicting opinions
食違う: (くいちがう) - to cross each other; to run counter to; to differ; to clash; to go awry
食靠れ: (しょくもたれ) - sitting heavy in one's stomach; remaining undigested
食頃: (くいごろ) - in season; at its best; ready for eating
食養: (しょくよう) - macrobiotics/prevention and cure of disease through diet (as expounded by Sagen Ishizuka (1850-1909)); taking nourishing food/eating a balanced diet; dietetics
食養生: (しょくようじょう) - taking nourishing food; eating a balanced diet
食餌制限: (しょくじせいげん) - dietary restriction
食餌療法: (しょくじりょうほう) - medical diet; dietary cure
食饌: (しょくせん) - food served on a table (esp. food served on a small Japanese table)
飢える: (かつえる) - to starve; to thirst; to be hungry
飢え凍える: (うえこごえる) - to starve and freeze to death
飢え死: (かつえじに) - (death from) starvation; starving to death
飢え死に: (かつえじに) - (death from) starvation; starving to death
飢きん: (ききん) - famine; drought; shortage; crop failure
飢凍: (きとう) - starving and freezing to death
飢死: (かつえじに) - (death from) starvation; starving to death
飢死に: (かつえじに) - (death from) starvation; starving to death
飢餓療法: (きがりょうほう) - inaniation treatment; starvation therapy
飢餓線上に: (きがせんじょうに) - on the verge of starvation; at the point of starving
飢饉: (kikin) - fome, seca, escassez, falha na colheita
飮む: (のむ) - (呑む is often used metaphorically; 服む is often used for medicine) to drink/to gulp/to swallow/to take (medicine); (also written 喫む)  to smoke (tobacco); to engulf/to overwhelm; to keep down/to suppress; to accept (e.g. demand, condition); to make light of/to conceal
飯: (arroz com carne) - meal , cooked rice; meal, food; one's livelihood
飯が食えない: (めしがくえない) - cannot make a living
飯ごう: (はんごう) - (soldier's) cooking utensils/mess kit; outdoor (camping) cooking utensils
飯の種: (めしのたね) - livelihood; source of income
飯の食い上げ: (めしのくいあげ) - losing the means of livelihood
飯を喰う: (めしをくう) - to devour a meal; to have a meal
飯を盛る: (めしをもる) - to serve rice in a bowl
飯を蒸らす: (めしをむらす) - to let cooked rice steam after turning off the heat
飯を食う: (めしをくう) - to devour a meal; to have a meal
飯事をする: (ままごとをする) - to play house
飯切: (はんぎり) - flat-bottomed wooden bowl for preparing sushi rice
飯匙倩: (ハブ) - habu (Trimeresurus flavoviridis); yellow-spotted pit viper
飯場: (はんば) - construction camp; bunkhouse; workers' living quarters
飯売女: (めしうりおんな) - maid at an inn who served clients and worked as a prostitute (Edo period)
飯屋: (めしや) - eating house; restaurant that makes simple food
飯島虫喰: (イイジマムシクイ) - Ijima's leaf warbler (Phylloscopus ijimae); Izu leaf warbler, Ijima's willow warbler; Ijima's warbler
